quizzes.question: The result of the condition statement is always:
How many times will the while loop run, if we remove the counting variable increment statement:
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The While Loop[/h1]

If you forget to increase the variable used in the condition, the loop will never end. 

[note]Make sure that the condition in a while loop eventually becomes [b]false[/b].[/note]
